entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times in the morning and afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
